thread.title: Plane ‘explodes and catches fire’ on runway at busy New York airport
thread.title_full: Plane ‘explodes and catches fire’ on runway at busy New York airport

title: Plane ‘explodes and catches fire’ on runway at busy New York airport
text:
Plane ‘explodes and catches fire’ on runway at busy New York airport Plane ‘explodes and catches fire’ on runway at busy New York airport A PLANE “burst into flames” while taxing down the runway at one of the world’s busiest airport. / Published 10th February 2017 
The pilot of the flight reported an engine fire while the preparing for takeoff at New York’s JFK airport, police said. 
Pictures taken by onlookers show the jet with flames spewing from the fuselage as it stood on the tarmac. 
Witnesses described hearing a “sudden explosion” before the plane was engulfed in flames. 
TWITTER NEW YORK: JFK airport was brought to a panic after a plane 'burst into flames' “Filming the takeoff and it suddenly exploded” Passenger 
Aerolineas Argentinas flight 1301, which was headed for Buenos Aires, taxied back to the gate as fire crews rushed to the scene. 
A passenger on board a plane nearby tweeted: “It was on literal f***ing fire”. 
The plane’s engine reportedly overheated and caught fire while it was standing stationary on the runway around 11pm local time. 
TWITTER PLANE FIRE: Aerolineas Argentinas flight aborted takeoff after reports of a fire This Instagram account is shaming terrible plane passengers Monday, 19th December 2016 Popular Instagram account @passengershaming, is documenting these cases of disgusting on-board behaviour – from slipping stinky feet between seats to disrobing down the aisles. 1 / 16
